name: Le Titim Na Hoíche - When Night Comes
name_original: Le Titim Na Hoíche - When Night Comes
description:
The project was self taught and developed for a thesis research purpose. The Banshee model was created using Blender with no experience prior to development and assets were bought and downloaded from open source websites.

If you have completed the game, please visit the form below to complete the questionnaire: 

https://forms.gle/uqTSp5UZwaHNwbuaA
